meanings.sent1: She slubbest the fabric by accident.
meanings.sent2: The yarn slubbested as she spun it.
meanings.sent3: He slubbested his hair with too much gel.
meanings.sent4: The road slubbested after the heavy rain.
meanings.sent5: The cake batter slubbested into a lumpy mess.

meanings.definition: To make or become untidy or dirty.
meanings.sent1: Please don't slubbest your room before guests come over.
meanings.sent2: The kids slubbested their clothes while playing outside.
meanings.sent3: The puppy slubbested the living room with muddy paw prints.
meanings.sent4: The old book was slubbested with dust on the shelf.
meanings.sent5: The kitchen floor was slubbested with crumbs after the party.

meanings.definition: To make or become disheveled or unkempt.
meanings.sent1: Her hair slubbested in the wind as she ran.
meanings.sent2: The cat slubbested its fur while grooming.
meanings.sent3: He always manages to slubbest his tie before important meetings.
meanings.sent4: The garden slubbested with overgrown weeds.
meanings.sent5: The actor's costume was intentionally slubbested for the role.
